tool_description: Creates detailed preparation protocols for samples based on their properties and intended analytical methods, including crushing, grinding, and splitting procedures.

sample_hardness.description: Hardness classification: soft, medium, hard, very_hard

target_particle_size_mm.description: Target particle size in millimeters for grinding

error_messages: Sample not found: The provided sample_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid sample_hardness: Use one of [soft, medium, hard, very_hard].
Invalid target_particle_size_mm: Must be between 0.001 and 10.0 millimeters.
Incompatible analyses: Some selected analyses cannot be performed on the same sample preparation.
usage: Provide sample_id, intended_analyses, and sample_hardness; optionally specify target_particle_size_mm. The tool generates a step-by-step preparation protocol.
